      • joinChannel

        public void joinChannel(LacewingClient c,
               boolean hide,
               boolean close)
                 throws LacewingException
        Attempts to join this channel
        Parameters:
        c - the client to join with
        hide - true if the channel should be hidden from the channel list if creating
        close - true if the channel should be closed when this client leaves if creating
        Throws:
        LacewingException - thrown if joining fails or is impossible
